name: Learntrail
tag_list: learning-management-system, lms, online-training, elearning, lcms, education, employee-training, training, video, powerpoint, messaging, assessment, survey, scorm
overview:
Learntrail is a learning management web application with a focus on ease of use and user experience. Learntrail can be used to create online courses, provide compliance training, generate in-depth learning reports, and provide learning certification. Numerous businesses around the world use Learntrail to automate much of their employee training process.

Learntrail is offered at as a fully supported Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) web application with pricing that starts at $29 a month. Learntrail also offers customized enterprise installations for companies with more advanced requirements.
